body:
Seems to be an nullptr exception. Here is the ouput of valgrind before the segfault. It seems to occur in libnode.so not in electron it self, but of course the null ptr still could come from electron.

==27167== Warning: set address range perms: large range [0x6e0ca625000, 0x6e0ea626000) (noaccess)
==27167== Invalid read of size 8
==27167==    at 0x6ED9AA7: ??? (in /home/user/project/electron/libnode.so)
==27167==    by 0x6ED9EBC: v8::Context::SetAlignedPointerInEmbedderData(int, void*) (in /home/user/project/electron/libnode.so)
==27167==    by 0x3E37E42: atom::AtomBrowserMainParts::PostEarlyInitialization() (in /home/user/project/electron/electron)
==27167==    by 0x2D35FE6: ??? (in /home/user/project/electron/electron)
==27167==    by 0x2D8DC0D: ??? (in /home/user/project/electron/electron)
==27167==    by 0x2D2B1C7: ??? (in /home/user/project/electron/electron)
==27167==    by 0x2A498FB: ??? (in /home/user/project/electron/electron)
==27167==    by 0x2A49CEF: ??? (in /home/user/project/electron/electron)
==27167==    by 0x3E30487: main (in /home/user/project/electron/electron)
==27167==  Address 0x0 is not stack'd, malloc'd or (recently) free'd
==27167== 
==27167== 
==27167== Process terminating with default action of signal 11 (SIGSEGV)
==27167==  Access not within mapped region at address 0x0
==27167==    at 0x6ED9AA7: ??? (in /home/user/project/electron/libnode.so)
==27167==    by 0x6ED9EBC: v8::Context::SetAlignedPointerInEmbedderData(int, void*) (in /home/user/project/electron/libnode.so)
==27167==    by 0x3E37E42: atom::AtomBrowserMainParts::PostEarlyInitialization() (in /home/user/project/electron/electron)
==27167==    by 0x2D35FE6: ??? (in /home/user/project/electron/electron)
==27167==    by 0x2D8DC0D: ??? (in /home/user/project/electron/electron)
==27167==    by 0x2D2B1C7: ??? (in /home/user/project/electron/electron)
==27167==    by 0x2A498FB: ??? (in /home/user/project/electron/electron)
==27167==    by 0x2A49CEF: ??? (in /home/user/project/electron/electron)
==27167==    by 0x3E30487: main (in /home/user/project/electron/electron)
Duplicate of #9434, support for these flags has been removed, the [`--inspect` flag](https://github.com/electron/electron/issues/9434) should be available in the next 1.7.x release.
